long_desc.thetext:
Current Mixin documentation[1] does not say anything about the order in which a mixin constructor is called. Therefore I started a topic on the mailing list[2] because one would expect a mixin constructor to be called before the constructor of a including class.
I found an old thread[3] (thanks to Derrell) which discussed the possibility to change the order. Maybe this should be noted in the documentation, so developers take into account a future change?
[1] http://manual.qooxdoo.org/1.6.x/pages/core/mixins.html [2] http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/message.php?msg_id=28986628 [3] http://thread.gmane.org/gmane.comp.lang.javascript.qooxdoo.devel/34050

I mark that as a duplicate because it is almost the same. We should still keep in mind that the documentation could be updated no matter if we change anything or not.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 2439 ***
